name: Prostate Imaging Reporting and Data System (PI-RADS)

attributes.name: Prostate anteroposterior dimension
attributes.description: Maximum measurement in the anteroposterior dimension on mid-sagittal T2W image

attributes.name: Prostate transverse dimension
attributes.description: Maximum measurement in transverse (left-right) dimension on axial T2 W image

attributes.name: Prostate longitudinal dimension
attributes.description: Maximum measurement in longitudinal ( craniocaudal) dimension on mid-sagittal T2W image

attributes.name: Total Prostate volume
attributes.description:
It may be determined using
manual or automated segmentation or calculated using ellipsoid formulation;(maximum AP
dimension) x (maximum longitudinal dimension) [both placed on the mid-sagittal T2W image] x
(maximum transverse dimension) [placed on the axial T2W image] x 0.52.

index_codes.display: prostate imaging reporting and data system (pi-rads)
